alert.note: Alert for Polk (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 04 at 10:46AM CDT until May 08 at 5:48PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at Oslo affecting Walsh, Marshall, Grand Forks and Polk Counties. Red River of the North at Drayton affecting Walsh, Pembina, Marshall and Kittson Counties. Red River of the North at Pembina affecting Pembina and Kittson Counties. Red River of the North at Fargo affecting Cass and Clay Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Minnesota...North Dakota... Red River of the North at East Grand Forks affecting Grand Forks and Polk Counties. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Red River of the North at East Grand Forks. * WHEN...Until Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 33.0 feet, Agricultural flooding begins along the Red River of the North between Grand Forks (River Mile 296) and Oslo (River Mile 271). * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 33.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late Sunday morning and continue falling to 24.0 feet next Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
